name: @inspire-labs-tms-tech/inspire-tms-open-api
description: An OpenAPI Client for Inspire TMS

scripts.types: npx openapi-typescript ./openapi.yaml -o ./src/gen/openapi.d.ts && openapi-generator-cli generate --generator-name typescript-axios --input-spec ./openapi.yaml --output src/gen && npm run convert
scripts.convert: npx -y @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i openapi.yaml -g openapi -o tmp && cp tmp/openapi.json src/openapi.json

author: Inspire Labs, LLC
